name: spreadsheetCreateSheet
description: Create spreadsheet from given spreadsheet object

examples.title: Tag Example
examples.description: The following example creates two sheets: CourseData and EvaluationSheet.
examples.code:
<!--- Get the spreadsheet data as a query. ---> 
 <cfquery name="courses" datasource="cfdocexamples" cachedwithin="#CreateTimeSpan(0, 6, 0, 0)#"> 
 SELECT CORNUMBER,DEPT_ID,COURSE_ID,CORNAME 
 FROM COURSELIST 
 </cfquery> 
 <cfscript> 
 ///We need an absolute path, so get the current directory path. theFile=GetDirectoryFromPath(GetCurrentTemplatePath()) & courses.xls"; 
 //Create a new Excel spreadsheet object and add the query data. 
 theSheet = SpreadsheetNew("CourseData"); 
 SpreadsheetAddRows(theSheet,courses); 
 //Add a new sheet. 
 SpreadsheetCreateSheet (theSheet, "EvaluationSheet"); 
 </cfscript> 
 <!--- Write the spreadsheet to a file, replacing any existing file. ---> 
 <cfspreadsheet action="write" filename="#theFile#" name="theSheet" sheet=1 sheetname="courses" overwrite=true>
